projects.name: InkZyll
projects.description: InkZyll is a blog webite which is developed using Angular framework that uses nodejs as backend in which is hosted and implemented and dockerized. Through InkZyll users can share content specifed to the domain that enclosed with their blog content. It was featured UI/UX interface of encouraging contents through likes ,comments and tag mentions. It was built in such a way that we can create the account with the provided information of profile picture url ,bio specification.

projects.name: ATS
projects.description: ATS was build by the Python StreamLit library provided with the NLP on parsing each data in resume and job descriptions. It works on of three window and gives the scores with the third party data matching that resembles the ATS scores. The ATS is the model that has the architecture in which it has the three main window that works seamless process on the providing description for the job to be recruited by the HR. The second window has the property of collecting the resumes from the candidate. The third window has the property of NLP that parses the input resume and the keyword provided in the job description.

projects.name: Se-Wid
projects.description: Se-Wid is an ecommerce platform in which the only products are displayed for sale is organic seeds and vegetables that are governed with the state of property. Developed with Angular framework with typescript and Bootstrap CSS framework which has the state of dynamic views to the user. It is built to connect the consumers with the ecommerce with an exclusive rare fruits and seed can be found.
